-	shop	posion	-1,678:200000,6128:500,7931:500,7932:5000,7933:5000,7934:5000,7935:5000,7936:5000,7937:5000
-	shop	bio	-1,7142:1000000,7126:-1,7127:-1,7128:-1,7129:-1,7130:-1,7131:-1,7132:-1,7133:-1,7134:-1,7135:70000,7136:70000,7137:70000,7138:70000,7139:70000,7144:-1,7140:-1,7141:-1,713:-1,1093:-1,1092:-1,911:-1,523:-1,1061:-1
-	shop	Mado	-1,2808:1000000,2802:1000000,2807:1000000,2803:500000,1549:200000,2805:200000,2139:30000,2806:200000,2800:200000,2801:200000,2804:200000,6147:200,6146:500,6145:20,12383:30000,18000:200,18001:500,18002:500,18003:500,18004:500,12392:2000,12393:4000,12394:6000

-	shop	shadow	-1,6120:1000,6121:1000,6122:1000,6123:1000
-	shop	wanderer	-1,11513:500
-	shop	genetic	-1,6255:2000,6250:600,6248:2000,1093:100,6279:10000,6280:10000,6281:10000,6282:10000,6283:10000,6284:10000:6285:10000,11022:10000,11023:10000,11024:10000,6210:30000,6211:30000,6212:15000,6217:20000,6249:10000,6251:10000,6258:10000,6261:10000,6262:10000,6259:10000


shop_in01,102,383,4	script	Job Tools	874,{
switch(select("วัตถุดิบผสมยาพิษ (Poison):ห้องทดลอง Bio Lab:อะไหล่หุ่นยนต์ Mado:ปลุกเสก Rune Stone:อุปกรณ์นักล่าสัตว์:คัมภีร์มหาเวทย์:Shadow Chaser:Wanderer / Minstrel:Genetic")){
	case 1:
		callshop "posion",1;
		end;
		break;
	
	case 2:
		callshop "bio",1;
		end;
		break;
	
	case 3:
		callshop "Mado",1;
		end;
		break;
	
	case 4:
		callshop "Rune",1;
		end;
		break;
	
	case 5:
		callshop "hun",1;
		end;
		break;
		
	case 6:
		callshop "magic",1;
		end;
		break;
	
	case 7:
		callshop "shadow",1;
		end;
		break;
		
	case 8:
		callshop "wanderer",1;
		end;
		break;
	
	case 9:
		callshop "genetic",1;
		end;
		break;
}
OnInit:
waitingroom "Job Tools Shop",0;
end;
}
